tool_description: It's a URL shortener  with aim to shorten a given URL and saving the visitors count and country source with each redirect.
name: shortern url
title: shortern url

api_list.name: /url
api_list.description: Make a new short URL by providing the full URL in the payload
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shortern-url.p.rapidapi.com/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shortern-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shortern-url.p.rapidapi.com/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shortern-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
